ygData.subject: A preadacon for the ages
ygData.msgSnippet: A pod fell shortly after the first. It crashed maybe a hundred yards from the other. Emerge from this one was the one called Apocalypse. His beast mode a tm2

Subject: A preadacon for the ages

 A pod fell shortly after the first. It crashed maybe a hundred yards from 
the other. Emerge from this one was the one called Apocalypse. His beast mode 
a tm2 red dragon. He was sent by the pred council to make sure a certain bot  
would pay for his crimes. He locked onto a predacon signal familiar to him. 
He flew off in its direction.
